lead_paragraph: Michael Schuckers doesn't consider himself a die-hard hockey fan, yet all he seems to think about in his spare time is that frozen rubber disk and what happens to it in every moment of every NHL game.

headline.print_headline: Hockey Analytics a Good Match for NY Statistics Professor
headline.main: Hockey Analytics a Good Match for NY Statistics Professor
